last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: An unlikely source offers Omar the chance to find out what really happened to his mother — and learn the truth behind his origin story.

name: Zero
overview: A teenager who can make herself invisible is used by an idiot to take control of the neighborhood and then meets a mysterious art student.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: After a meet-cute with Anna, Omar is accused of setting a motorbike on fire — and unwittingly reveals his invisibility secret to a local thug.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: After the neighborhood generator gets sabotaged, Sharif tries to recruit Omar to help, who’s preoccupied with Anna. But then Omar comes up with an idea.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Sharif comes up with a plan to use Omar's power to help raise the funds needed to fix the neighborhood generator, but Anna’s appearance throws Omar off.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Omar suddenly remembers what Dietmar told him before he died, possibly identifying who could be behind all the attacks on the neighborhood.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Omar and Anna regret their breakup so they agree to meet at a comic book convention. Seeking revenge, Rico plots to set up someone close to Sharif.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Anna has good news to share with Omar but gets angry over his revelation. Omar manages to get the goods on Rico but Momo suffers the consequences.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Omar discovers that using his invisibility power causes disturbances for Awa. Distraught over her realization, Anna breaks ties with her father.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: An unlikely source offers Omar the chance to find out what really happened to his mother — and learn the truth behind his origin story.
